title: "Optimization of therapeutic antibodies by predicting antigen specificity from antibody sequence via deep learning"
excerpt: "Therapeutic antibodies can be optimized using deep-learning models trained on antibody-mutagenesis libraries to generate antibody variants and predict their antigen specificity."
